item.title: Argentina's Milei wins big in midterms with 'chainsaw' austerity
item.description: Milei's radical spending cuts have won favour with Donald Trump, but also attracted widespread criticism.

item.title: India and China resume direct flights as ties improve
item.description: The flight landed in Guangzhou on Monday morning, a milestone in the thawing of bilateral ties.

item.title: International troops won't want to enforce Gaza peace, says King of Jordan
item.description: King Abdullah tells the BBC there would need to be peace in Gaza before any international forces were deployed.

item.title: In Russia's 'blitz' of Ukraine, the question of appeasement is back
item.description: A large gulf remains between the US and European view of how to end the Ukraine war.

item.title: Four killed in Cameroon protests as results due in contested election
item.description: An opposition candidate is challenging the incumbent president's 43-year hold on power.
